title: BRNO Dining Chair Mocha
body: Featuring an ingenious and sleek single piece cantilevered design, a perfect blend of art and function, the BRNO Dining Chair or simply Mies Dining Chair was designed in 1930. Originally, there are two versions of the chair; one in tubular steel and the other in flat steel. The chair, an icon of 20th-century design, is celebrated for its lean profile, clean lines and meticulous attention to detail.
